author: Andrew Ahern
comment: Pricing model is screwed up. €5 for one device, no tier for two, €15 for three. I have two devices and was expected to pay €7.50 each. Yeah, fat chance. Way to use your own pricing against yourself,  Greedo.

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: You can create two different accounts and purchase the 1-device plan for each account.

author: Nicholas Brown
comment: Got an email from the Cerberus devs recently stating how Cerberus uses a subscription model, however as a legacy user on an old lifetime purchase, they've confirmed they will continue to honour that lifetime licence.  Well done Cerberus for doing the right thing!  👍

author: G. Lamar Wilkie
comment: I dropped my rating WAY down, and here's why: I got a license for 5 devices, enough for me, the wife and our two adult kids. However, there is a critical flaw... everyone whose device is registered under the same account has to use the same login credentials. And anyone on the account can see where everyone else is, at any given time. There is NO WAY our adult kids will sign onto this, knowing that Mom & Dad could log in and know their whereabouts 24/7!  I contacted the company and let them know that this is a show-stopper for us; that they need to add users by EMAIL ADDRESS and then by their unique DEVICES. That way, everyone would have their own login credentials. Until that happens, though, Cerberus and Persona are not under consideration for us.

author: Alexandru Gheorghe Visinoiu
comment: Forgot password, app doesnt send email. Doesnt send emails for pictures taken with wrong unlock code either. When trying to deactivate it blinks screen with lorem ipsum text and doesnt get deactivated. Somethimes the quick buttons menu pops down somethimes not. Conclusion is the app is broken atm.

author: paul lachance
comment: The ads make the app difficult to use when opening from the web on a phone. I paid for this app so I'm not sure why all the ads all of a sudden. Before the ads: *****  Now: **

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience. If you are still experiencing the issue, please send an email to support@cerberusapp.com

author: Sampat Poojari
comment: this app is very useful if u have expensive mobile phones.and if ur phone us lost or stolen specially in mumbai local you can track locations,take pictures and many more.this app is superb.

author: Adhiraj Sirohi
comment: The best phone tracking app out there. Well worth the money, better get it now than regret not having it later!

author: A Google User
comment: Ha! I just installed "system framework"  into my system apps using clockworkmod. It's actually cerberus, and it stays in the device even after a factory reset. Brilliant! Check out their website if you want to do it too...

author: A Google User
comment: Used to be 5 stars. Now I have to upgrade after purchasing a lifetime subscription ages ago???!!! Not cool at all

author: Kevin Mortenson
comment: The best product run by the worst decision makers.  Whatever you do don't buy any life time licenses.

author: James Murphy
comment: Great app. Just had a email to advertise the new app. However really happy that my lifetime license hasn't bee  affected. Thank you again for a great app.

author: Thai Nguyen
comment: app and website worked well until recently adding Ads on the website. unable to login with mobile web browser, pop-ups with 3 large advertisement that cant clear

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: Sorry about that. Are you still experiencing the issue?

author: Janine C
comment: Found my phone when I thought someone stole it. So many awesome perks to it as well. One of the best apps I have downloaded

author: Mark B
comment: Long time user with a lifetime license; excellent performance and provides far more features than the Android Device Manager.

author: Gnanavel r
comment: Unable to purchase via online payment link everything is not eligible

author: Nabil Boustany
comment: the automatic photo capture  is not working..... Every wrong unlock an email is send that a picture of somebody try to open the phone..... But doesn't contain picture.....

author: Neil Davies
comment: Another app trying to get money out of customers twice. I used to rate this app and now I despise Cerburus. 100% Greed

author: Justin Lawler
comment: But "Block Power Menu" not working for me... I can still turn off the device. .  *edit* after a reboot it works! Thanks for the reply!

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: Please try to reboot the phone. If it still does not work after the reboot, send us an email so we can do some tests.

comment: Can i delete old device? My account exceed 3 devices

comment: Trying to disable device administrator, showing Lorem Ipsum text

author: Tech Data
comment: Best anti theft by far and is cheapest too!

author: Paolo Bonfiglioli
comment: Good!
Very useful app. Glad I got in early with the lifetime license though, thanks for keeping that going.

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: Please send an email to support@cerberusapp.com , so we can do some tests.

author: Madhu Sudhan
comment: Best anti theft app

author: Norman Sosa
comment: It is super

author: Frederic Leunissen
comment: Great app! Love it!

author: Jon Can
comment: Super

author: Anish Singh
comment: Helpfull app ... i like it

author: Prkash Lovanshi
comment: Sup

author: alfonso lopez
comment: Perfect

author: R Wilson
comment: Top Notch! I have never had a phone stolen but I appreciate the fact that If it ever happens I can track it, back up all my files remotely, and then brick it so the thief can't use it or get any of my info from it. Many thanks to the Developers for such a great app 😀

author: Brian Sayatovic
comment: Uninstalled when they went back on my earlier lifetime license. Cerberus had so many ways to protect and find my phone that I always felt safe. I've never did have my phone stolen, but should it have happened, Cerberus would've been my best option. But on principle, I refuse to use it. How can anyone trust the developer on any terms after this?

author: David Pham
comment: Hello There. I am is one of the early users and purchased a lifetime license for the Anti-theft app. I got an  email informing me about  a new released app: Cerberus Personal Safety (Persona). Following phase was also found on this email " we appreciate it and of course we will honor the terms of that license".  Two links were embedded in this email. Following these links, I was leaded to a webpage  asking for my credit card number to pay for this upgrade (First  year free! then 22.50/year).  Please let me know if "upgrade" is needed in order for me  to continue using this app.  If upgrade is needed, why I have to  pay the  2nd time for an  app that was  paid a lifetime license.  Looking forward to hearing from you.  David P.

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: If you just want to use Cerberus Antitheft you do not have to do anything, your lifetime license will stay. You have to upgrade only if you also want to use Cerberus Personal Safety and our future services.

author: Gail Bartell
comment: This app definitely works. I have tested the tracking and capturing photos when the device is hidden. There is no hiding the device without Cerberus detecting the exact location. This app is much more full proof than any other program out there. It's impossible to delete and undetectable if the program is hidden. I give it 10 stars.

author: Will Harvey
comment: Works great when you don't now it's there. However, in the last few weeks, it keeps giving a "device located" notification that can't be swiped away-you have to restart the phone. Not ideal when you want it to be invisible to a thief's eyes. Would have been 5 stars otherwise.  Edit: won't let me unauthorized the app as an device administrator. Won't let me delete the app. This has just become bad news - avoid until it's fixed

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: You can either long-press on the notification and you should see an option to hide all notifications from Cerberus, or you can install the "disguised" version of Cerberus that does not have any notifications from our website: https://www.cerberusapp.com/get

author: A Google User
comment: Fantastic app. Google asked them to put a notification icon but you users can always deactivate it by removing all cerberus notifications. Easy. Google didn't understand at all what this app is about. Why do they not include a notification in all their apps that track us all constantly. Bit unfair and bullyish. Thanks Cerberus for your app. It is better than ever, stay strong.

author: shane hopkins
comment: Waste of time... They control what you can do with the app which I find very disappointing, also my phone now says "device located" so I believe someone may of hacked my account and is tracing my phone or cerberus is.   Poor customer service so it's time to remove this app and find something better.

reply.author: LSDroid
reply.content: You can either long-press on the notification and you should see an option to hide all notifications from Cerberus, or you can install the "disguised" version of Cerberus that does not have any notifications from our website: https://www.cerberusapp.com/get

author: Gregory Veizades
comment: Very powerful security app. Key feature is blocking of power menus and quick settings while device is locked.  If phone is stolen, prevents the if from turning phone off or turning off data. But even if they succeed with that, they can be turned back on with text commands.

author: Shanmuga Priya
comment: After upgrading to Android version 8, blocking the status bar in locked screen is no longer available. Is rooting the device the only option for enabling this ? If so, can I find the detailed steps for doing the same anywhere?
